programme.title: 17/07/09 Palaeontologist Jorn Hurum
programme.short_synopsis: Palaeontologist Jorn Hurum talks about finding Ida, the 47 million year old fossil.
programme.medium_synopsis:
Palaeontologist Jorn Hurum talks about finding Ida, the 47 million year old primate fossil. 

He tells presenter Carrie Gracie about the  the bar room deals which got Ida to his museum in Oslo.
programme.long_synopsis:
Palaeontologist Jorn Hurum, led the research into the 47 million year-old primate fossil, Ida.

Dr Hurum tells Carrie Gracie about of the  world of fossil trading and the bar room deals that brought the primate out of a private collection and to world attention.

He discusses the controversies over his research and the claims made for it.
